mapper.insert: insert into employee(empno, empname, empbirth, emptel, empaddr, empauth, empid, emppass, empretired) values (#{empno}, #{empname}, #{empbirth}, #{emptel}, #{empaddr}, #{empauth}, #{empid}, password(#{emppass}), #{empretired})
mapper.select: select * from employee where empretired=#{empretired} order by empno desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
